New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest 50 against Australia in a T20 match, reaching the milestone in 19 balls
Key Match Events: Travis Head's 76 kept Australia in the game
David Warner was dismissed in the first over of the chase for six
Mitch Marsh was superbly caught by Axar Patel on the boundary
Glenn Maxwell was bowled by Kuldeep Yadav for 20
Travis Head was caught trying to take on Jasprit Bumrah
Pre-Game Insights: There were no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Australia's hopes of being world champions in all formats are in grave danger
The result means their World Cup will be over if Afghanistan beat Bangladesh later on Monday local time in the Caribbean
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma's 92 from 41 balls helped India post 5-205 in St Lucia
Josh Hazlewood was able to slow India down, appearing as if he was bowling on a different pitch with his 1-14
The undefeated India qualify for the semi-finals and will face England
